ABOUT-ME.TITLE: A little about me
ABOUT-ME.CONTENT: I am a physics engineer and a varied technician who ended up working as web developer. I love cooking, drawing and minecraft.

SKILLS.CONTENT1: Currently I'm mainly focused in frontend stuff, but I'm used to adapt to another tasks and roles like backend and design assistance.
SKILLS.CONTENT2: Therefore I have learned tools beyond my main area.

COURSES.TITLE: Always willing to learn
COURSES.CONTENT: Throughout my professional career I have discovered that there is always something new to learn, even if you think you have mastered something, do not close yourself to new knowledge!

PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: I believe that teamwork is fundamental not only for the workplace, so throughout my career I have constantly collaborated with my colleagues for the development of projects as well as my own skills.

HYUNDAI.TITLE: Hyundai Singapore
HYUNDAI.DESCRIPTION:
Hyundai Singapore's website provides useful information on services and sales of its vehicles.
Curretly, we update this website constantly to add new content.

KOMOCO.TITLE: Komoco
KOMOCO.DESCRIPTION: Komoco Holdings Pte Ltd is a Singapore company that distributes and markets automobiles, acting as a dealer for various brands and offering maintenance and repair services.

AUTOPAC.TITLE: Komoco Autopac System
AUTOPAC.DESCRIPTION:
Komoco Autopac System specializes in the sale of vehicle management systems and technology solutions for the automotive industry.
We are continuously working on updates and maintenance.

CAPELLA.TITLE: Capella Auto Singapore
CAPELLA.DESCRIPTION:
Capella Auto Singapore is a company engaged in the sale and distribution of vehicles in Singapore.
We developed this website to schedule test drives.

MASONRY.TITLE: Freemasonry Singapore
MASONRY.DESCRIPTION:
The Grand Lodge of Singapore provides an overview of Freemasonry in the region.
It highlights the history of the organization and the principles governing the fraternity.

SAVAGE.TITLE: Savage Club Singapore
SAVAGE.DESCRIPTION: The Savage Club Singapore is a private and exclusive organization dedicated to providing a space for social interaction, networking and professional development.

IFYNI.TITLE: Ifyni Singapore
IFYNI.DESCRIPTION:
Ifyni Singapore is a company specializing in the sale of motorcycles and related accessories from partner brands in Singapore.
Their website offers a clear overview of their brand catalog.
